title: Celestial Scroll on a Mortal Wall
prompt: (masterpiece), best quality, highly detailed illustration, 16:9 aspect ratio, A full-body shot of a mysterious Xianxia street artist, dressed in ancient dark robes and a wide straw hat, holding a massive, long-handled calligraphy brush. The artist stands facing a colossal weathered brick wall at warm, misty dawn. The artist is actively painting an epic, highly detailed mural in the Xianxia style. The mural depicts a vibrant mystical landscape featuring towering karst mountains, multiple waterfalls, swirling ethereal pink and white clouds (qi), classical Chinese temples, and a beautiful, flying celestial maiden (Apsara) with flowing ribbons and silk. Soft golden sunrise light illuminates the scene, casting dramatic shadows. Two small, glowing spirit creatures (a yellow fox spirit and a purple creature) observe the artist near the ground. Ancient Chinese courtyard and pagoda architecture visible in the background, Fantasy Xianxia style, epic composition, digital painting.
